item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0073; 01:20AM; 624 N Beaudry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3csWGNe; Chinatown; KNOCKDOWN: 34 Firefighters knocked down the bulk of the fire from the exterior and then transitioned to an offensive operation with two companies making an interior fire attack, achieving full knockdown in 14 mins. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E201 E211 E220 E4 T1 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0073; 01:06AM; 959 N Beaudry Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ASgeno; Echo Park; One story, single family dwelling (vacant) well involved in fire with at least one additional building exposed (also vacant). There is an electrical hazard (wires) in front. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E20 E201 E211 E220 E4 T1 T11 T20; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0930; 04:18PM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/38MPhGK; Chatsworth; FINAL UPDATE: Fire area estimated at 10 acres with 100% containment. All air resources are released while ground resources will continue the mop up operation to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BC9 CE83 CE84 CM40 CM42 E100 E104 E105 E106 E107 E18 E24 E287 E290 E39 E70 E73 E8 E83 E84 E88 E90 E91 E93 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA104 RA70 RA72 RI600 T87 T90 WT88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1049; 04:07PM; 5529 N Greenbush Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QW7Vg6; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E278 RA102 RA860 T39 T60 T78; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Brush Fire FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED 08/27/2022 INC#0930

item.description: Update FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0930; 04:04PM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/38MPhGK; Chatsworth; All forward progress of the fire has been stopped. There is no further update to the estimated 7 acres in size. There were no structures damaged, no evacuations were enacted and no injuries reported. Both ground and air resources will remain on scene throughout the rest of the day working to address all hot spots. There are no further details and no additional updates are anticipated.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BC9 CE83 CE84 CM40 CM42 E100 E104 E105 E106 E107 E18 E24 E287 E290 E39 E70 E73 E8 E83 E84 E88 E90 E91 E93 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA104 RA70 RA72 RI600 T87 T90 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1049; 03:43PM; 5529 N Greenbush Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QW7Vg6; Sherman Oaks; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Initial reports indicate fire in one room and the attic.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E278 T39 T60 T78; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0930; 03:31PM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/38MPhGK; Chatsworth; The fire is now estimated at 7 acres in light to medium brush. There is a potential threat to structures. Firefighters continue to work in the offensive mode and are making good, steady progress. No injuries reported.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BC9 CE83 CM40 CM42 E100 E104 E105 E106 E107 E18 E24 E287 E290 E39 E70 E73 E8 E83 E84 E88 E90 E91 E93 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA104 RA70 RA72 RI600 T87 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0930; 02:32PM; Wb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/38MPhGK; Chatsworth; Approximatley one acre of light to medium brush, burning up into a draw (away from De Soto) under light wind with no structures threatened at this time. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 BC9 E104 E107 E18 E287 E290 E70 E73 E8 E90 E93 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H5 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA70 T87 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0536; 10:11AM; 119 S Av 55; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dPmPGb; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 24 firefighters (prior to arrival of the additionally requested task force) extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was located in a mezzanine above the office of a 4 bay auto/paint shop. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E201 E212 E250 E42 E47 E55 RA1 T1 T12 T50; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0536; 09:59AM; 119 S Av 55; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dPmPGb; Highland Park; One story (approx 100' x 50') auto shop with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Initial reports are of possible attic fire.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E201 E212 E47 E55 RA1 T1 T12; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
